shortdesc.ph: Sets the camera manual focus position.

p.codeblock: public abstract int setCameraFocusPositionInPreview(float positionX, float positionY);
public abstract setCameraFocusPositionInPreview(positionX: number, positionY: number): number;
virtual int setCameraFocusPositionInPreview(float positionX, float positionY) = 0;
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|IRtcEngine") int SetCameraFocusPositionInPreview(float positionX, float positionY);
public abstract int SetCameraFocusPositionInPreview(float positionX, float positionY);
Future<void> setCameraFocusPositionInPreview( {required double positionX, required double positionY});

li.props: cpp unreal bp unity flutter cs

ul.li: This method is for Android and iOS only.
After a successful method call, the SDK triggers the callback.

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp android flutter unity rn cs
plentry.pd: The horizontal coordinate of the touchpoint in the view.

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp android flutter unity rn cs
plentry.pd: The vertical coordinate of the touchpoint in the view.
The coordinate of the touchpoint in the view.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.props: native unreal bp unity rn cs
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
